requirements.summary: Create a single-page React application with smooth scroll navigation linking to three sections: Homepage (Hero), Portfolio, and About Me. Include a fixed top navigation bar with the photographer's brand name and anchor links to each section.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation bar is fixed at the top and visible on all scroll positions
Nav links smoothly scroll to the Homepage/Hero, Portfolio, and About Me sections
Brand name is displayed prominently in the nav bar

file_operations.description: Transform App.tsx into a single-page layout with three main sections (Hero, Portfolio, About) and implement smooth scroll behavior for navigation links
Create a fixed top navigation bar component displaying the photographer's brand name 'Lens & Light' and anchor links to Hero, Portfolio, and About sections with smooth scroll behavior

requirements.summary: Build a full-screen Hero section on the Homepage featuring a large background photography image, an overlaid headline (e.g., 'Capturing Moments That Last a Lifetime'), a short tagline, and a call-to-action button that scrolls to the Portfolio section.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section fills the full viewport height
Background image is displayed with a dark overlay for text legibility
Headline and tagline text are clearly readable over the background
CTA button scrolls to the Portfolio section on click

file_operations.description: Create a full-screen Hero section with the background image from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png, a dark overlay for text contrast, the headline 'Capturing Moments That Last a Lifetime', a tagline, and a CTA button that triggers smooth scroll to the Portfolio section

requirements.summary: Build a Portfolio section that displays a responsive masonry or grid gallery of photography sample images. Each image should be clickable to open a full-screen lightbox view with a close button.
acceptanceCriteria: Portfolio grid is responsive across mobile, tablet, and desktop breakpoints
At least 9 sample images are displayed in the grid
Clicking an image opens a lightbox modal with the full image
Lightbox can be closed via a close button or by pressing Escape

file_operations.description: Create a Portfolio section with a responsive masonry grid displaying 9 portfolio images from frontend/public/assets/generated (portfolio-1.dim_800x1000.png through portfolio-9.dim_800x1000.png). Each image is clickable to open a full-screen lightbox modal
Create a Lightbox component that displays a full-screen image modal with a close button and support for closing via Escape key press

requirements.summary: Build an About Me section featuring a professional photographer portrait image, a biography paragraph, a list of specialties or skills (e.g., Portrait, Landscape, Wedding), and contact/social media links.
acceptanceCriteria: Photographer portrait image is displayed alongside the bio text
Biography paragraph introduces the photographer professionally
At least 3 specialty tags or skill badges are shown
Contact or social links are displayed and functional

file_operations.description: Create an About Me section displaying the photographer portrait from frontend/public/assets/generated/photographer-portrait.dim_600x800.png, a professional biography paragraph, specialty tags (Portrait, Landscape, Wedding, etc.), and contact/social media links

requirements.summary: Apply a cohesive dark-mode editorial visual theme across the entire site: deep charcoal/black backgrounds, off-white and warm gold typography, generous whitespace, elegant serif font for headings, and clean sans-serif for body text. The aesthetic should feel high-end and gallery-like, consistent with luxury photography studios.
acceptanceCriteria: All sections use the same dark charcoal/black background palette
Headings use an elegant serif typeface
Body text uses a clean sans-serif typeface
Accent colors (warm gold or off-white) are applied consistently to buttons, links, and highlights
Overall feel is minimal, spacious, and gallery-like

file_operations.description: Update global styles to apply the dark-mode editorial theme with deep charcoal/black backgrounds, off-white and warm gold accent colors, elegant serif font imports and definitions for headings, clean sans-serif for body text, and generous whitespace settings

Extend Tailwind configuration with custom dark theme color palette (charcoal/black backgrounds, off-white, warm gold accents), serif and sans-serif font families, and spacing utilities to support the high-end gallery aesthetic
